attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
hi,
   i on behalf of all young teens wish to have a voice,music is 1 way to do this,
i am a ANTI RAPPER i bring messages through rap what change lives and had many many shows where i have brought people to tears with the lyrics,
you do have the power for a govenmnent music and having teens on your side so i can Speak out and i agree with labour on lots off issues,i wish to help and be heard............michael mcCheyne

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
